input.sentences: some friends rode cable cars to the top of a canyon .
they took some photos pf the vast scenery .
they even saw some wildlife at the top .
then they descended into some caves
and took photos together while touring the inside .
output.sentences: As I looked out of the helicopter at the road below, I could see why we were going in by air.
The ariel views of the pyramid were breathtaking.
As we got closer to land, a raven followed us the rest of the way.
We landed at the pyramid in front of a door with the lovliest white light surrounding it.
We finally got to go inside of the great pyramid.
